text: Ali Derakhshan (July 7, 1919 - July 7, 1981 in Tehran) was an Iranian politician. He opponent and fighter against the Pahlavi government and a member of the Central Council of the Islamic Republic Party and in charge of the party's finances. == References == Category:1919 births Category:1981 deaths Category:Iranian politicians Category:People from Tehran
title: Ali Derakhshan (politician)
